autoplay.description_zh: 自动轮播间隔，单位为 ms

duration.description: The duration of the animation, in ms

show-indicators.description: Whether or not an indicator is displayed

vertical.description: Whether it is a portrait scroll

touchable.description: Whether it is possible to swipe with gestures
touchable.description_zh: 是否可以通过手势滑动

stop-propagation.description: Whether to prevent the sliding event from bubbling
stop-propagation.description_zh: 是否阻止滑动事件冒泡

lazy-render.description: Whether to delay rendering undisplayed carousels
lazy-render.description_zh: 是否延迟渲染未展示的轮播

methods.name: resize
methods.description: This method can be called to trigger a redraw when the outer element size or component display state changes
methods.description_zh: 外层元素大小或组件显示状态变化时，可以调用此方法来触发重绘

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered at the end of each page carousel
events.params: 每一页轮播结束后触发
events.description_zh: 每一页轮播结束后触发

events.name: drag-start
events.description: Triggered when the user starts dragging the carousel component
events.params: 当用户开始拖动轮播组件时触发
events.description_zh: 当用户开始拖动轮播组件时触发

events.name: drag-end
events.description: Triggered when the user ends dragging the carousel component
events.params: 当用户结束拖动轮播组件时触发
events.description_zh: 当用户结束拖动轮播组件时触发
